statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Now give you two integers n m, you just tell me the m-th number after radix point in 1/n,for example n=4,the first numble after point is 2,the second is 5,and all 0 followed

statement.title: Input
statement.content: Each line of input will contain a pair of integers for n and m(1<=n<=10^7,1<=m<=10^5)

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each line of input, your program should print a numble on a line,according to the above rules
